CREATE TABLE tblCardImage( cardImageUrl PRIMARY KEY, cardImage NONE );
CREATE TABLE tblCouponImage( couponImageUrl PRIMARY KEY, expiryDate TEXT, couponIsUsed INTEGER, couponImage NONE );
New! You\'re in control - choose what info you want to share with apps.
CREATE TABLE tblCategory ( category_id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, category_name TEXT);

CREATE TABLE tblCoupon( campaignId TEXT NOT NULL, merchantId TEXT NOT NULL, couponProfileNo TEXT NOT NULL, couponSerialNo TEXT, expiryDate TEXT, campaignTitle TEXT, campaignShortDescription TEXT, campaignDescription TEXT, couponImageUrl TEXT, couponIsRedeemed TEXT, PRIMARY KEY ( campaignId,merchantId,couponProfileNo ) );
CREATE TABLE tblInbox ( msg_id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, msg_title TEXT, msg_content TEXT, msg_read_yn TEXT, msg_status INTEGER DEFAULT 0, create_date TEXT);
CREATE TABLE tblPushMsg ( noti_tid TEXT PRIMARY KEY, noti_event TEXT NOT NULL, noti_aps TEXT, noti_data TEXT, noti_status INTEGER DEFAULT 0);
CREATE TABLE tblRecentNumber ( nId TEXT NOT NULL, number TEXT NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE tblMySpApp ( service_id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, service_ver TEXT, service_name TEXT, package TEXT, icon_img TEXT, detail_img TEXT, description TEXT, category_id TEXT, app_state INTEGER, applet_state INTEGER, update_date NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, sp_id TEXT, need_registration TEXT CHECK(need_registration IN (\'Y\',\'N\')) DEFAULT \'N\', reg_url TEXT, cnt_of_usage INTEGER DEFAULT 0, uid TEXT, aid TEXT, app_type INTEGER, priority INTEGER DEFAULT 100, app_ver TEXT, card_number TEXT, card_exp TEXT, display_order INTEGER, isDefaultYn TEXT, isInPocketYn TEXT, paymentNetwork TEXT, UNIQUE(package), FOREIGN KEY(category_id) REFERENCES tblCategory(category_id), FOREIGN KEY(sp_id) REFERENCES tblSP(sp_id) );
CREATE TABLE tblSP ( sp_id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, sp_name TEXT );
CREATE TABLE tblUserInfo ( uiName TEXT PRIMARY KEY, uiValue TEXT , uiType TEXT NOT NULL);
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO tblCardImage (cardImageUrl, cardImage) VALUES( ?,? )
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO tblCategory (category_id, category_name) VALUES(?,?)

INSERT OR IGNORE INTO tblCoupon (campaignId, merchantId, couponProfileNo, couponSerialNo, expiryDate, campaignTitle, campaignShortDescription,couponImageUrl,couponIsRedeemed) VALUES( ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,? )
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO tblCouponImage (couponImageUrl, couponImage, couponIsUsed, expiryDate) VALUES( ?,?,0 ,NULL )
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO tblInbox (msg_id, msg_title, msg_content, msg_read_yn, create_date ) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?)
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO tblUserInfo (uiName, uiValue,uiType ) VALUES( ?, ? , ? )
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO tblUserInfo (uiName, uiValue,uiType ) VALUES(\'pin\',? ,\'security\' )
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO tblUserInfo (uiName, uiValue,uiType ) VALUES(\'publicKey\',? ,\'security\' )
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO tblPushMsg (noti_tid, noti_event, noti_aps, noti_data, noti_status) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?)
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO tblSP (sp_id, sp_name) VALUES(?,?)

INSERT OR IGNORE INTO tblMySpApp (service_id, service_ver, service_name, package, icon_img, detail_img, description, category_id, app_state, applet_state, sp_id, need_registration, reg_url, uid, aid, app_type, priority, app_ver, card_number, card_exp, display_order, isDefaultYn, paymentNetwork) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO tblUserInfo (uiName, uiValue,uiType ) VALUES(\'msisdn\',? ,\'identity\' )
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO tblUserInfo (uiName, uiValue,uiType ) VALUES(\'secureToken\',? ,\'security\' )
ORDER BY priority ASC, service_name DESC
ORDER BY priority ASC, cnt_of_usage DESC, service_id ASC
SELECT campaignId, merchantId, couponProfileNo, couponSerialNo, expiryDate, campaignTitle, campaignShortDescription,couponImageUrl,couponIsRedeemed FROM tblCoupon
SELECT msg_id, msg_title, msg_content, msg_read_yn, create_date FROM tblInbox
SELECT uiName, uiValue, uiType FROM tblUserInfo WHERE uiName = ?
SELECT uiName, uiValue FROM tblUserInfo WHERE uiType= \'security\'
SELECT uiName, uiValue FROM tblUserInfo WHERE uiName = \'publicKey\' and uiType= \'security\'
SELECT noti_tid, noti_event, noti_aps, noti_data, noti_status FROM tblPushMsg

SELECT service_id, service_ver, service_name, package, icon_img, detail_img, description, tblMySpApp.category_id, category_name, app_state, applet_state, update_date, tblSP.sp_id, sp_name, need_registration, reg_url, cnt_of_usage, uid, aid, app_type, priority, app_ver, card_number, card_exp, display_order, isDefaultYn, isInPocketYn, paymentNetwork
SELECT uiName, uiValue FROM tblUserInfo WHERE uiName = \'secureToken\' and uiType= \'security\'
UPDATE tblCategory SET category_name = ? WHERE category_id = ?
UPDATE tblSP SET sp_name = ? WHERE sp_id = ?
WHERE campaignId = ? and merchantId = ? and couponProfileNo = ?
WHERE tblMySpApp.category_id = tblCategory.category_id AND tblSP.sp_id = tblMySpApp.sp_id
